channel.title: I'm taking a c++ class this summer and want some advice
channel.description: hey, i really want to learn java eventually but i'm starting off with a c++ class to get me acquainted with programming. Can anyone suggest some programs I should try to create by myself on the side? What c++ program would be helpful?
